articles.content:

articles.title: The Math Behind Wordle Guesses - Quanta Magazine
articles.description: Wordle is a word game. But you can use math to optimize your chances of winning (without cheating).
articles.content: In the simple game of Wordle, players have to guess a secret five-letter word in six or fewer turns based on clues about the presence and location of letters revealed by their previous guesses. While… [+18888 chars]

articles.author: Bryan Alexander, USA TODAY
articles.title: 'George & Tammy': Jessica Chastain, Michael Shannon reveal love story - USA TODAY
articles.description: Michael Shannon and Jessica Chastain sang their hearts in "George & Tammy," the painful love story of country legends George Jones and Tammy Wynette.
articles.content:
SANTA MONICA, Calif.  – Jessica Chastain did all the heavy lifting in one weighty scene for Showtime's "George & Tammy." 
As country legend Tammy Wynette, Chastain literally carried her 6-foot-3… [+5526 chars]

articles.author: Komal RJ Panchal
articles.title: Cirkus trailer: Ranveer Singh-Rohit Shetty's punchy comedy hides a Deepika Padukone surprise - The Indian Express
articles.description: Cirkus trailer: Rohit Shetty-Ranveer Singh's film is a potpourri of formula jokes, a fantastic ensemble cast and some punchy one-liners. Watch out for Deepika Padukone's zingy surprise.
articles.content: The trailer of Rohit Shetty’s Cirkus starring Ranveer Singh, Johny Lever, Sanjay Mishra, Varun Sharma, Pooja Hegde and Jacqueline Fernandez is here and it is raring to tickle your funny bone. Cirkus … [+1664 chars]
